marklogic.body:

Both have said that the 2nd does not allow private citizens to carry guns, as has four justices on the Supreme court. Â They are all in clear violation of their oath of office to defend and protect the Constitution. Â they are in clear violation of the second amendment which they turned their backs on. My first paragraph is as clear as a bell
The Heller v Wash DC and McDonald v Chicago rulings were meant for theÂ ENTIREÂ nation not just a fewÂ chosen Spots,Â Â but yet we haveÂ city'sÂ and states that have chosen to go their own way ANDÂ disregard the second amendment and that of the high court. Â In reality, I should be able to travel from coast to coast with my glock and back again unimpeded, Â but thats only in principle to some states who are still in violation of the 2nd amendment to theÂ Constitution.
As for the rest of my garbage post, I make noÂ apology'sÂ expressed or implied.Â Â Â Â
